pages.title: Hardcore Player Revival
pages.text: The world seems to be far more kind to yourself than anything else gasping around you. Even when you blacked out after too much damage, you always woke up healthy and fit again, as if you had been given new life.$(br)In exceptional situations, however, the world is not so kind to you, almost as if you've angered your patron. Alas! You've got something figured out to cheat them now, should things ever get tough.

pages.title: Spirit Inst. Recipe
pages.text: To revive a Player that died in Hardcore, you will need $(thing)their personal player head$(), a hefty sum of resources and a bit of time.
